newsitem.title: USA: U.S. debt futures higher, but off session highs.
newsitem.headline: U.S. debt futures higher, but off session highs.

text.p: May 1 - U.S. debt futures remained higher, but were down from the day's peaks as enthusiasm about a U.S. budget deal faded slightly. White House says Clinton encouraged by progress on budget, but some unresolved issues remain. Traders said market choppy as traders jockey for position before payrolls Friday, seen up 211,00 with jobless rate steady at 5.2 percent.
